mapper.select: select * from sys09_code where sys09_code_kind_id = #{codeKindId} order by sys09_seq

select * from sys09_code a where a.sys09_code_kind_id = #{codeKindId} and a.sys09_apply_date = ( select max(b.sys09_apply_date) from sys09_code b where b.sys09_code_kind_id = a.sys09_code_kind_id and b.sys09_cd = a.sys09_cd and b.sys09_apply_date <= #{applyDate} ) order by sys09_seq
